class.name: wxSpinCtrl
class.description: wxSpinCtrl combines wxTextCtrl and wxSpinButton in one control.

flag.name: wxSP_ARROW_KEYS
flag.description: The user can use arrow keys to change the value.

flag.name: wxSP_WRAP
flag.description: The value wraps at the minimum and maximum.

flag.name: wxTE_PROCESS_ENTER
flag.description: Indicates that the control should generate wxEVT_COMMAND_TEXT_ENTER events. Using this style will prevent the user from using the Enter key for dialog navigation (e.g. activating the default button in the dialog) under MSW.

flag.name: wxALIGN_LEFT
flag.description: Same as wxTE_LEFT for wxTextCtrl: the text is left aligned.

flag.name: wxALIGN_CENTRE
flag.description: Same as wxTE_CENTRE for wxTextCtrl: the text is centered.

flag.name: wxALIGN_RIGHT
flag.description: Same as wxTE_RIGHT for wxTextCtrl: the text is right aligned (this is the default).

type.name: EVT_SPINCTRL
type.description: Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_SPINCTRL_UPDATED event, which is generated whenever the numeric value of the spin control is updated.
